body:
Comment 4 by **paul@pachube.com**: 
Ah, fair enough. A quick test with postbin.org does confirm that '=' is ok in query
params. URL-Safe may be the wrong term, my mistake.

The issue arose when trying to use base64.URLEncoding in a cookie, which seemed to be
truncating the data.  And the modified Base64 for url encoding was mentioned here:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Base64#URL_applications.
